response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs and aspirations. We are offering this remarkable item to you at a special price of $950,000, which we believe strikes a fair balance between our valuation and your perceived worth to you. This offer is designed to ensure that both parties benefit from this transaction. Should you decide to proceed, we promise a seamless and professional experience throughout the process. We look forward to hearing your response soon. Thank you for considering our proposal.", "product_price": 950000}
